ingredientStatement.text: Ingredients: Reconstituted Tomato Juice (Water And Concentrated Juice Of Tomatoes), Contains Less Than 2% Of: Sugar, Salt, Distilled Vinegar, Natural Flavor, Concentrated Lemon Juice, Molasses, Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid), Onion Extract, Red Pepper, Black Pepper, Dehydrated Garlic, Celery Extract, Citric Acid.

productText.text: Makes 9 Bloody Marys—check out the back of the bottle for recipes!
productText.textHTML: Makes 9 Bloody Marys—check out the back of the bottle for recipes!

productText.text: V8® Bloody Mary Mix. Your favorite veggie juice … transformed into your favorite drink mix. Cheers to a more convenient and tasty Bloody Mary!
productText.textHTML: V8® Bloody Mary Mix. Your favorite veggie juice … transformed into your favorite drink mix. Cheers to a more convenient and tasty Bloody Mary!

productText.text: V8® Bloody Mary Mix. Your favorite veggie juice ... transformed into your favorite drink mix. Perfectly blended with just the right amount of spice and with only 40 calories per serving,  it's a delicious way to spice up Sunday brunch. Great straight, mixed, stirred, shaken or garnished. Cheers to a more convenient and tasty Bloody Mary!
productText.textHTML: V8® Bloody Mary Mix. Your favorite veggie juice ... transformed into your favorite drink mix. Perfectly blended with just the right amount of spice and with only 40 calories per serving,  it's a delicious way to spice up Sunday brunch. Great straight, mixed, stirred, shaken or garnished. Cheers to a more convenient and tasty Bloody Mary!

productText.text: V8® was born out of the idea that great taste and great nutrition can go hand in hand. For over 8 decades, that idea has thrived. Because getting the veggies you need in the drink you love fuels a day well lived. V8®. There's nothing like the original. Trusted since 1933.
